content: I have a normed vector space E and a subspace S and I want to write a "random" (not in any probabilistic sense) projection from E to S. I don't have that my space is complete nor that the field is R or C but I actually do not care that the projection has anything to do with the orthogonal projection, any projection is ok. What is the easiest way to do that?
Are you wanting a projection as a hypothesis, or do you want to show one exists?
